palette.title: 300 Lovers!!!
palette.description: Last time I did one of these was back when I reached 100 Lovers! I just want to thank everyone for being so generous and sweet. I can honestly say this is probably the 1st time that I've ever really felt like I was a part of a community before. And what a fantastic community it is. :) Everyone here is so kind and helpful. For being the internet ColourLovers sure is lacking in the troll department! XD
